backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with global background and border styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling navigation between dashboard, species selection, and settings within a dark theme.
frontend/src/components/controls/BottomC: Touch-friendly control bar with buttons for manual turn, species menu, settings, and alarm mute.
frontend/src/components/gauges/CircularG: Animated SVG circular gauge showing a value with eased transitions, status colors, and optional alarm effects.
frontend/src/components/help/HelpAboutPa: Help panel explaining kiosk mode setup, screen pinning, and auto‑start guidance for Android devices.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelLayo: Layout wrapper providing optional header/footer and kiosk-mode-aware scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/ScreenTra: Wrapper adding smooth fade‑in transitions when screens change.
frontend/src/components/species/SpeciesT: Large button showing a species icon and label for selection with optional loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useEsp32Commands.ts: Provides React Query mutations to send control commands to the ESP32 and handles success/error toasts and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useIncubatorStatus.ts: Fetches incubator status from the ESP32 using React Query with polling and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing authentication state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, utilities, and animations for gauges and UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/esp32Client.ts: Defines a client for communicating with the ESP32 API, handling timeouts, errors, and endpoints for status and control commands.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Displays incubator metrics, connection status, controls, and gauges using live data and ESP32 command hooks.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides UI for editing local settings and sending temperature and humidity updates to the ESP32.
frontend/src/screens/SpeciesSelectionScr: Renders the species selection UI with preset species icons and sends a mode change to the ESP32 before navigating back to the dashboard. Uses SpeciesTileButton components and a back button within a panel layout.
frontend/src/state/useKioskMode.ts: Provides a hook to read and persist kiosk-mode state in localStorage. Exposes the current mode and a setter.
frontend/src/state/useLocalSettings.ts: Manages incubation-related local settings with defaults, loading and saving them to localStorage. Offers an update function for partial settings changes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries, typography, and animation. Extends theme tokens for UI consistency.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, requirements, features, and image needs for an ESP32‑controlled incubator touchscreen app. Stores versioned state, architectural notes, and feature list.
